title: Drawings in Sand
description: Woken by her young daughter to the worst hangover of her life, Stella believes she can't sink any lower. Then she argues with her boyfriend, her ex and lies to her boss. Her only escape is more booze even though it means risking her job and losing her daughter. When a kindly colleague encourages Stella to seek help her search for healing takes her deep into disturbing secrets in her familyâ€™s past.
author: Yvonne Spence
